content.text:
# 1956 Guild of Television Producers and Directors Awards

The 1956 Guild of Television Producers and Directors Awards were the second annual giving of the awards which later became known as the British Academy Television Awards.
Winners
*Actor
**Peter Cushing
*Actress
**Virginia McKenna
*Designer
**Bruce Angrave
*Personality
**Glyn Daniel
*Production
**Gil Calder
*Script writer
**Colin Morris
*Writers Award
**Colin Morris
References
Sources
*[http://www.bafta.org/site/page230.html Archive of winners on official BAFTA website] (retrieved February 19, 2006).
